note.p: Barrister. Eldest son of William Mackmurdo Hacon. Educated at Balliol College, Oxford, and Lincoln’s Inn. Called to the bar, 1885. In 1896, with the designer Charles de Sousy Ricketts, set up Vale Press, which published fine editions, including The Vale Shakespeare.
